topic.title: Home
topic.section: There are two main "Home" pages: one for the Open Monograph Press as a whole, or Main Site Home Page; and a press-level Home Page. Both home pages contain much of the same information, but differ in certain respects.

Upon accessing the Main Site Home Page you will be provided with a description of the site as a whole, and a list of presses residing on the site. From here you can access a press's Home Page, access any available current monographs, and also register with the press. The Main Site navigation features break down as follows:

Top Navigation Bar

Home and About provide information about the site (as opposed to an individual press).

Log In allows you to create a user profile if you have not already done so. See {help_topic key="user.registerAndProfile" text="Register and Profile"}. The Log In link will be replaced with a User Home link once you register and log in. See {help_topic key="user.userHome" text="User Home"}.

Register allows you to add a press to your User Home Page.

Search allows you to search the entire site or just an individual press. See {help_topic key="user.searchAndBrowse" text="Search and Browse"}.

Right Navigation Bar

The Open Monograph Press link will take you to the Public Knowledge Project website, which provides resources for Open Monograph Press and other related software.

The Press Help link provides context sensitive help.

The form under the User heading allows you to log in if you have a username and password. After logging in you will be taken to your User Home page. Once logged in, there will be links under User to a list of presses you have registered to; to your profile; and to log out.

Language allows you to choose a language supported by OMP.

The search field under Press Content allows you to search the site in a basic variety of ways. For a more comprehensive search, click the Search link on the top navigation bar.

Font Size allows you to make the site font size smaller or bigger.

The home page for a press is the one which is seen when View Press under the press's name on the site home page is clicked, or when a press's name is clicked from User Home.The Press Home Page breaks down as follows:

Top Navigation Bar

Home and About provide information about the specific press.

Log In and Register act as above, but redirect to the press's home page rather than the site home page.

User Home appears once you have logged in, and displays the user home page. This page provides links to manage your press roles, and to manage your account.

Search provides extensive search options, but is used to search only the press currently being viewed.

Archives displays the names of previously published monographs, if available. Clicking on the name of a previously published monograph will display its table of contents.

An Announcements link appears on the top navigation bar if the Press Manager has enabled announcements. Clicking on this link will access the announcements page.

Right Navigation Bar

The Open Monograph Press link will take you to the Public Knowledge Project website, which provides resources for Open Monograph Press and other related software.

The Press Help link provides context sensitive help.

The form under User will allow you to log in if you have a username and password. After logging in you will be taken to your User Home page. Once logged in, there will be links under User to a list of presses you have registered to; to your profile; and to log out.

Language allows you to choose a language supported by OMP.

The search field under Press Content allows you to search the press's content in a basic variety of ways. For a more comprehensive search, click the Search link on the top navigation bar.

Font Size allows you to make the site font size smaller or bigger.

There is also information for Authors, Readers and Librarians listed in the right navigation bar.
